name: .BMSON
summary: Learn about .BMSON files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: If you want to edit a BMSON file, it is best to open it with a dedicated BMSON editor, such as BmsONE (Windows, Mac). This will allow you to more easily view, understand, and edit the data your BMSON file contains. However, you can also open and edit a BMSON file with Microsoft Visual Studio Code or any other text editor.
You can play BMSON format songs in Bemusic Bemuse (Web) and raindrop (Windows, Linux).
